data.message: Why is it there are certain people (and there have been a lot lately) I can't block? This is very frustrating.

replies.message: Hey Alan. Try using these steps to block someone: http://on.fb.me/1NVx9a3. Thanks! -Jordan
They do not work at all. If I could send you a video of me doing it and it failing that would be great.

Facebook I am editor on a page that the owner died unexpectedly.  I took over the organization as I was next  in command.    I need access to the page as admin so I dont have to create a whole new page.  I have not heard back from anyone.  How can this be resolved?
